SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.bill_start_date,'%Y') years, b.bill_name, b.bill_start_date, b.bill_end_date, b.current_paid_amount FROM bill_info b LEFT JOIN emp_employee e ON e.store_id = b.store_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{empId} AND b.status = 'HISTORY' ORDER b.bill_start_date DESC
